txt.en: Talk to Hundi at Echad Dúnann

'Ráthwald sent you to see me? I do not know why, for you seem prepared enough to me!\n\n'Our people have not always gotten along, but if you can help us to reclaim Khazad-dûm, perhaps that will change!'

'Ah, you bear your heritage proudly, if you will forgive me the word-play! You are of the line of Beorn, and there is no sense in denying it!\n\n'You have come all this way looking forward, and never back? Admirable, but if we are to regain the land of my fathers we will need you at your most fearsome! Speak with Hundi at the camp of Echad Dúnann, and he will ensure you are prepared.'
'Speak to Hundi at the camp of Echad Dúnann, [placeholder]. He will prepare you for what lies ahead.'
After a journey of many miles, you have come to the Walls of Moria. How will the dwarves react to your sudden arrival? They were not overly friendly with Beorn or any of his line.
Hundi is at the camp of Echad Dúnann, outside the Walls of Moria, in Eregion.
